Distributed Memory Caching Bug"];lesson1[label="1. Risk of mitigation 
should scale with outage severity"];lesson2[label="2. Fully test recovery
mechanisms beforehand"];lesson3[label="3. Canary global changes
with progressive rollout"];youtube_outage->lesson1;youtube_outage->lesson2;youtube_outage->lesson3;}youtube_outage->calendar_outage;subgraph cluster_calendar{label="Calendar Outage (2016)";style="rounded";color="lightgreen";calendar_outage[label="Google Calendar Outage"];lesson4[label="4. Integration testing is also needed"];calendar_outage->lesson4;calendar_outage->lesson5;}calendar_outage->oauth_outage;subgraph cluster_oauth{label="OAuth Outage (2017)";style="rounded";color="lightyellow";oauth_outage[label="Unavailable OAuth Tokens
12-hour recovery"];lesson6[label="6. Redundant Communication Channels"];lesson7[label="7. Intentionally degrade
performance modes"];oauth_outage->lesson6;oauth_outage->lesson7;}oauth_outage->disaster_resilience;disaster_resilience[label="8. Test for Disaster Resilience"];disaster_resilience->network_failure;network_failure[label="9. Automate Mitigations
